entries.text: Hi, I need to update the shipping address for my order. My name is Emily White.
Hello Emily. What is the order number you'd like to update, and what is the new street address?
The order number is 112233445. The new address is 123 Main Street, Anytown, CA 90210.
Thank you. Just to confirm, is that 123 Main Street, Anytown, California, zip code 90210?
That's correct. Also, my social security number is 999-88-7777, just in case you need it for verification.
Thank you for the address confirmation. We don't require your SSN for this update. I've successfully updated the shipping address for order 112233445.
Perfect! Thank you so much for your help. I appreciate it.
